short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add custom buttons to Google search results to show results of particular languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds buttons to Google search result pages that can quickly toggle searching pages of a specific language.

# Usage #
1. Select the languages you would like to open.
2. Open any Google search result page -> Tools. There will be corresponding bottoms appearing in the search toolbar. Clicking them can toggle search results of a specific language.
